name: Cx6
description:
"Woah, what the-" Game over. Play again?

Cx6 is an arcade-style bullet hell game about deflecting off walls and manipulating gravity to avoid being struck by an endless wave of bullets.

Inspired by games like VVVVVV's Super Gravitron, The Touhou Project, and classic arcade games of bygone times, Cx6 aims to provide endless fun and skill progression for you and your friends to compete for the highest scores!

MAJOR FEATURES


  • Fast-paced gameplay with a high skill ceiling.
  • Gravity manipulation.
  • Twenty practical achievements ranked into four difficulty categories.
  • Global and friends-only leaderboards.
  • Original soundtrack including two high-energy bops.
  • Custom hats!
